items.title: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Investors with Losses on their Investment in UnitedHealth Group Incorporated of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines - UNH
items.description: NEW YORK, June 1, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP announces that a class action lawsuit has been filed against UnitedHealth Group IncorporatedÂ  . Such investors are advised to contact...
